Application Process

Simple & Transparent Process

We provide end-to-end professional services from initial assessment to successful approval. Every step is tracked by dedicated experts to ensure your application proceeds smoothly and efficiently.

Six Key Steps

1

Initial Consultation & Assessment

1-2 weeks

Our professional consultants will conduct in-depth discussions to understand your family situation, immigration goals, financial status, and timeline. Through comprehensive assessment, we develop the most suitable application strategy for you.

Family member information collection
Eligibility pre-screening & risk assessment
Preliminary plan recommendations
Cost & timeline estimation
2

Investment Plan Selection

1-2 weeks

Based on your capital scale, risk appetite, and investment objectives, we help you choose the optimal investment route (real estate, government bonds, or business investment) and assist with signing investment agreements.

Detailed investment route comparison
Partner institution recommendations
Investment agreement drafting & review
Source of funds compliance review
3

Document Preparation & Translation

3-6 weeks

We provide detailed document checklists and preparation guidance. All documents are processed by professional translation teams to ensure compliance with Hungarian official requirements. Our legal team oversees every step to avoid missing materials or format errors.

Personalized document checklist
Professional translation & notarization
Criminal record certificate processing
Financial proof document preparation
4

Application Submission

1-2 weeks

Our team will assist you in completing the online application system, booking interview appointments (if required), and officially submitting all materials to the Hungarian Immigration Office. We ensure your application package is complete and accurate.

Online application system filing
Interview scheduling & coaching
Official materials submission
Submission receipt & file management
5

Processing Follow-Up

Per official timeline

Once your application enters official review, we continuously track processing progress and promptly respond to any supplemental document requests or inquiries from immigration authorities. We'll assist in preparing additional materials if needed.

Regular progress checks & updates
Immediate supplemental document handling
Immigration office communication
Complete progress transparency
6

Approval & Post-Approval Services

Ongoing support

Congratulations! After approval, we assist with residence card collection and provide ongoing services including renewal reminders, family member additions, permanent residence applications, and more to ensure your Hungarian residency status remains valid.

Residence card collection guidance
Renewal reminder services
Permanent residence / citizenship consultation
Relocation & settlement support

Overall Timeline Planning

Documentation

Submission
Application Submission: 1-2 weeks

Common Application Document Checklist

Personal Identity Documents

  • • Valid passport (6+ months validity)
  • • Birth certificate
  • • Marriage/civil status certificate (if applicable)
  • • Passport photos (Schengen visa standard)

Background Check Documents

  • • Police clearance certificate (home & residence country)
  • • Medical examination report
  • • Proof of address
  • • Curriculum vitae / resume (if required)

Financial Proof Documents

  • • Bank statements (past 6 months)
  • • Asset proof (real estate, stocks, etc.)
  • • Income proof / tax records
  • • Source of funds explanation letter

Investment-Related Documents

  • • Investment agreement / contract
  • • Investment fund transfer proof
  • • Property / bond / business certificates
  • • Investment project description documents

Note: All non-Hungarian documents require officially certified translations. We provide one-stop translation and notarization services to ensure all materials meet official requirements.

Process FAQs

How many trips to Hungary are required during the application?

Typically 1-2 trips depending on your investment route. The first may be for property viewing or signing investment agreements, and the second for interviews (if required) and collecting your residence card. We arrange all trips to maximize efficiency.

What if supplemental documents are requested?

Our team will be notified immediately and communicate specific requirements with you. We'll assist in quickly preparing supplemental materials to ensure timely submission within the required deadline, avoiding approval delays.

Can the process be expedited?

Official processing times are determined by immigration authorities and cannot be expedited. However, we can optimize the preparation phase (consultation, documentation, submission) to minimize preparation time and ensure your materials pass the first review, reducing delays from supplemental requests.

Can I work or live in Hungary during the application period?

After submission, temporary residence permits may be available in certain cases. Specific rights depend on your chosen investment route and individual circumstances. We'll provide appropriate guidance based on your needs to ensure legal compliance.
